QuestData.Title: Adventures in Archaeology
QuestData.Description: Hey, you want to try my new diemetradon dogs? No? Raptor risotto? Pterrordax ptacos?$b$bFine. Oh, I just remembered! I have a friend nearby that might be able to use your assistance. His name is Spark Nilminer, and he's Marshal Expeditions' chief archaeology officer.$b$bHe's been sent out to Golakka Hot Springs, to the west. You'll likely find him on the springs' western shore.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Spark Nilminer at Golakka Hot Springs.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Spark Nilminer at Golakka Hot Springs.
QuestData.RewardText: Good ol' Nolen. How is he doing? Hopefully better than I am...
